CustomField.formula: IF( Min_1_Shop_has_SI__c >0 && zz_expected_turnover__c < Turnover_by_average_basket__c, Turnover_by_average_basket__c, IF(Min_1_Shop_has_SI__c =0 && zz_expected_turnover__c < Turnover_by_average_shopping_basket__c, Turnover_by_average_shopping_basket__c, 0) )
CustomField.label: Lift forecast value
